price: I neka znate da su imeci vaši i djeca vaša samo iskušenje, i da je samo u Allaha nagrada velika.
arabic: وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَآ أَمۡوَٰلُكُمۡ وَأَوۡلَٰدُكُمۡ فِتۡنَةٞ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-iʿ'lamū annamā amwālukum wa-awlādukum fit'natun wa-anna al-laha ʿindahu ajrun ʿaẓīmun
